content: sunshine crop top free pattern by @crochet 4 days thank you for downloading this free pattern this is my first time making a written pattern thank you for your feedback materials used loops & threads creme cotton in mustard weight 4 yarn - cotton blend 4 5mm crochet hook yarn needle measuring tape scissors this pattern is for a size small adjustments may have to be made to account for bust size 6 row half_double_crochet - chain no decrease half_double_crochet half_double_crochet 2 together front 15 row half_double_crochet - panel single_crochet decrease at make 2 the beginning 5 double_crochet shell of each row start end 13 more row half_double_crochet - decrease at the beginning of the row on the tail side sunshine crop top half_double_crochet in the first 28 stitches free pattern by @crochet 4 days 3 row half_double_crochet - 113 stitches chain 115 along the front panel inside edge - make 2 - single_crochet 36 chain scalloped half_double_crochet edge chain 1 and turn single_crochet into first single_crochet in row half_double_crochet 2 together single_crochet skip 1 place 5 double_crochet into 3rd single_crochet 5 double_crochet shell of row 5 double start crochet shell end repeat until you have six 5 double crochet shells single_crochet rest of the sunshine crop top row free pattern tie off and cut by @crochet 4 days weave in ends last row should have 37 stitches back panel tie off and weave in ends repeat decrease row for 15 row decrease at the beginning of each row half_double_crochet 50 stitches across for 17 row chain 52 sunshine crop top free pattern by @crochet 4 days finally construct your crop top by sewing it together with a yarn needle
